title: Ticket #1445: Dedicated scheduler leaks memory with parallel scheduling groups
description: There is a small memory leak in the parallel universe when the parallel scheduling group feature is enabled.
remarks:
2010-Jun-11 11:21:39 by matt:
Any more details?

2010-Jun-11 12:31:35 by gthain:
the list of groups is put into a StringList, and I was confused about ownership therein. So, it's proportional to number of scheduling cycles, and the number of parallel scheduling groups

Long since been fixed...
creator: gthain
